Dependency Information

Apache Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.btmatthews.maven.plugins</groupId>
  <artifactId>crx-maven-plugin</artifactId>
  <version>1.1.1</version>
  <type>${project.packaging</type>
</dependency>

Apache Buildr

'com.btmatthews.maven.plugins:crx-maven-plugin:${project.packaging:1.1.1'

Apache Ant

<dependency org="com.btmatthews.maven.plugins" name="crx-maven-plugin" rev="1.1.1">
  <artifact name="crx-maven-plugin" type="${project.packaging" />
</dependency>

Groovy Grape

@Grapes(
@Grab(group='com.btmatthews.maven.plugins', module='crx-maven-plugin', version='1.1.1')
)

Grails

compile 'com.btmatthews.maven.plugins:crx-maven-plugin:1.1.1'

Leiningen

[com.btmatthews.maven.plugins/crx-maven-plugin "1.1.1"]

SBT

libraryDependencies += "com.btmatthews.maven.plugins" %% "crx-maven-plugin" % "1.1.1"
